name: Hill Metro Bus Simulator 3d
description:
You are being allocated to the assignment to bring travelers securely from their Bus Stop to their goal. In Metro Bus Driver - Hill Simulator you go up against the part of a genuine transport driver working movements in a Offroad track .Here you simply need to drive precisely to survive and take your travelers to their goal securely Unlike those huge city test systems brimming with activity, people on foot and movement lights where you have to mind the laws of the streets.
THE MOUNTAINS ARE DANGEROUS!

Features:
• It's a level based hill simulation game with progressive difficulties at each level.
• Drive carefully without hitting any obstacles else the passengers will yell at you.
• Make your own way to drive the Bus and explore each level.
• The bus depot, parking area, tea stall and the crowd gives a real look and feel of a hill station.
• Different camera angles is an added feature where you can switch between as per your comfort.
• Four different buses including a double-decker bus
• Use your hill driving skills, complete each mission and unlock the other levels.
